file_content.text: My... my dear Bahlea... these will probably be the last words I have to say to you. And I don't have long....
I was a fool, Bahlea... as always... I shouldn't have come hunting alone, I knew that.
But our little Rusa is so sick. And the doctor said... that the teeth of the Manka cats could make medicine. Cure her.
I tried... I tried to get their teeth for Rusa... but the Flesh Raiders train the cats to be vicious. So horrible.
I'm sorry, my love... and so tired. I must sleep to gather my strength... in case the Manka cats come back. I'll bring their teeth home. Somehow....
